answers.answer: sounds like preclampisa(sp) to me!! I woulkd say the doc will prob admiit you or put you on bedrest ..somthing or the other!! Good luck i hopw everything goes ok!

Can be the weather too? My feet get super swollen when I go to a place with a super high humidity index.I'm not sure but with preeclampsia you would also have your hands swollen, Rosa. But its always good to check your blood pressure

I had severe swelling with my first baby and none with my second. It was just water weight and I thought it was normal for most pregnancies but like I said with my second I had no swelling what so ever. You are just getting along in your pregnancy so it could be from pressure. Good luck and I hope you feel better!

question: I'm 34w and am suffering SEVERE swelling of my feet and lower legs. it's horrible. it just began a few days ago and my ankles are so swollen that if I push in it leaves a dent that lasts a few  minutes. Gross I know.I've tried laying w/my legs up, and everything.... Even laying overnight with my legs up only lessened the swelling a little.Let me make it clear I have NO SWELLING OF THE FACE AND HANDS. My dr's appointment is tomorrow and I plan on addressing this issue but I wondered if anyone has delt with this and how they fixed it..
title: swelling at 34w
